name: Dispirited
description:
Dispirited is a 2-4 player Asymmetrical game.

Players swap between playing as a Hero and a Spirit. Everyone's goal is to capture 5 points, however, this is only possible to do as the Hero.

As a Hero your main objective is to avoid being hit by the spirits and capture as much points as possible.

As a Spirit your goal is to do as much damage to the hero as possible and make sure to get the final melee hit in order to become the next Hero.

Requirements: At least 2 Controllers and A Friend :)

This game was created by 3 Designers; James Leung, Johnny Kwong and Merve Soylu, in a period of 4 weeks as a student project
